features: [White Dressers & Chests of Drawers]: Features 6 removable storage drawers made of high-quality non-woven fabrics, wooden front , Wooden handle is not only convenient but also beautiful,no matter kids or adult. Overall dimension: 31.5''*11.8''*28.7''.Drawer dimension: 14.6’’*11.8’’*7.9’’.
[Wooden Top and Front ]: This white cloest dresser drawer organizers has water-resistant wood top and particleboard drawer front,offer stable support and ensure years of use,convenient to clean.

[Strong and Sturdy System] : High quality steel frame,each drawer has a special Velcro strips to keep the drawers always at their slots,super easy to slide in and out but will not bend or fall down. anti-tipping straps ensure the safety of your energetic kids.

[Easy Assembly and Move]: Easy to assemble with hardware included in half an hour,4 adjustable feet protect your floor from scratches. It's lightweight so you could move to any room you want to be tidier easily.

[Mutifuction Fabric Dresser]: Smaller dimension with larger capacity fits everywhere in your house for closets, bedrooms, nurseries, playrooms, entrance passages,office, nightstand etc. 100% Satisfaction customer service before and after purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, cute and sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: It took me about 30-45 minutes to put it together instructions were easy to follow. It's very small which I wanted since I needed it to fit in my closet definitely would recommend getting it. Packaging was also perfect no missing part or scratches! It's not that sturdy but will work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than you might think
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my daughter's dorm room. I realize the description gives measurements so I'm not sure why I expected it to be bigger but it's very small. It ended up working out because she has the world's smallest dorm room and it looks adorable but just make sure you get out your tape measure and actually measure so you aren't surprised on move in day. Another thing, it's not easy to put together. It didn't take too long but it was kind of a pain and one of the drawers is a little off. But it's very cute and serving our purpose of cheap dorm furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: easy to assemble, and looks great in the nursery!! it is small, with cloth drawers. it’s not the most sturdy.. but overall it’s okay for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much better than I expected for the price
reviews.reviewText: I was seeking storage space for the guest room and did not want to pay the cost of wood furniture which I wanted for durability and esthetic. This item did not disappoint me at all. The color was bright, easy & fast to assemble and durable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and light
reviews.reviewText: Simple to assemble and fits perfectly in my closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: various quality issues, but I still think it was worth the price for temporary clothing storage in my walk in closet. Some pieces don’t line up properly, the slots for the drawers not symmetrical so some drawers fit nicely while others do not. Sturdy for me even without the wall attachment. Some damage to the corners of the top piece.

El mueble es de súper mala calidad! Ya había comprado aquí en Amazon otros muebles parecidos y a un precio más barato y de muchísima mejor calidad que este! No quede para nada satisfecha lo regresaré.
